scripts.build-deps: yarn workspace @apicize/lib-typescript build && yarn workspace @apicize/toolkit build
scripts.ui: yarn run build-deps && yarn workspace @apicize/app tauri dev
scripts.ui:watch: concurrently "yarn workspace @apicize/lib-typescript watch" "yarn workspace @apicize/toolkit watch" "yarn run build-deps && yarn workspace @apicize/app tauri dev"
